translations: v.使……连载；使……成序列（serialize 的过去式和过去分词）

phrs.translation: 序列化, 系列式面试, 串行, 以串行
系列化面试, 有效性
序列化形式, 序列化格式
串行调度, 翻译, 串行化调度英语

sentences.sentence: The novel was serialized on TV in six parts.
sentences.translation: 这部小说分六集在电视上播出。

sentences.sentence: Attention was first drawn to the book when a condensed version was serialized in The New Yorker.
sentences.translation: 这本书的缩写本在《纽约人》上连载时首次引起了人们的注意。

sentences.sentence: His novels are still serialized there.
sentences.translation: 他的小说仍在那儿连载。
